details:
adjective
- quick and energetic
= synonyms: rattling
- marked by up-to-dateness in dress and manners
= synonyms: jaunty
- apt to speak irritably
= synonyms: snappish
- pleasantly cold and invigorating
= synonyms: frosty, nipping, nippy, crisp
- smart and fashionable
= example: smart and fashionable
= synonyms: whipping
